                    106
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    !
                    
                      
    if (variance_structure == "homoscedastic") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
      # Linear model with homoscedastic errors

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    !
                    
                      
      message("Fitting linear model with homoscedastic errors")

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    !
                    
                      
      model <- stats::lm(fixed_formula, data = data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
      # GLS model with heteroscedastic errors by dose level

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    !
                    
                      
      message("Fitting GLS model with heteroscedastic errors")

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    !
                    
                      
      model <- nlme::gls(

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    !
                    
                      
        fixed_formula,

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    !
                    
                      
        weights = nlme::varIdent(form = as.formula(paste("~ 1 |", dose_var))),

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    !
                    
                      
        data = data

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
  # Create contrast for Dunnett test

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
  # This is the corrected part that properly handles variable names

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    !
                    
                      
  linfct <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    !
                    
                      
  if (inherits(model, "lmerMod") || inherits(model, "lm") || inherits(model, "lme")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
    # For lmer,lme and lm models

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    !
                    
                      
    dunnett_args <- list(model)

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    !
                    
                      
    mc_formula <- paste(dose_var, "= 'Dunnett'")

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    !
                    
                      
    mc_call <- call("mcp")

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    !
                    
                      
    mc_call[[dose_var]] <- "Dunnett"

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
    # Set control level if not the first level

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    !
                    
                      
    if (control_level != levels(data[[dose_var]])[1]) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    !
                    
                      
      mc_call$base <- which(levels(data[[dose_var]]) == as.character(control_level))

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    !
                    
                      
    dunnett_args$linfct <- mc_call

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    !
                    
                      
    dunnett_args$alternative <- alternative

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    !
                    
                      
    dunnett_result <- do.call(multcomp::glht, dunnett_args)

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    !
                    
                      
  } else if (inherits(model, "gls")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
    # For nlme models (lme, gls)

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
    # Create a contrast matrix manually

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
    ## browser()

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    !
                    
                      
    n_levels <- nlevels(data[[dose_var]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    !
                    
                      
    control_idx <- which(levels(data[[dose_var]]) == as.character(control_level))

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
    # Create Dunnett contrast matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    !
                    
                      
    K <- matrix(0, n_levels - 1, n_levels)

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    !
                    
                      
    row_idx <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    !
                    
                      
    for (i in 1:n_levels) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    !
                    
                      
      if (i != control_idx) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    !
                    
                      
        K[row_idx, i] <- 1        # Treatment level

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
        #K[row_idx, control_idx] <- -1  # Control level

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    !
                    
                      
        row_idx <- row_idx + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
    # Create row names for the contrast matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    !
                    
                      
    level_names <- levels(data[[dose_var]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    !
                    
                      
    row_names <- character(n_levels - 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    !
                    
                      
    row_idx <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    !
                    
                      
    for (i in 1:n_levels) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    !
                    
                      
      if (i != control_idx) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    !
                    
                      
        row_names[row_idx] <- paste(level_names[i], "-", level_names[control_idx])

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    !
                    
                      
        row_idx <- row_idx + 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    !
                    
                      
    rownames(K) <- row_names

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
    # Create the contrast

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    !
                    
                      
    linfct <- multcomp::glht(model, linfct = K, alternative = alternative)

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    !
                    
                      
    dunnett_result <- linfct

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
  # Get test results

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    !
                    
                      
  dunnett_summary <- summary(dunnett_result, test = multcomp::adjusted("single-step"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    !
                    
                      
  dunnett_confint <- confint(dunnett_result, level = conf_level)

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
  # Extract p-values and format comparison results

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    !
                    
                      
  p_values <- dunnett_summary$test$pvalues

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
  ##browser()

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    !
                    
                      
  comparisons <- rownames(as.data.frame(dunnett_result$linfct))

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
  # Create a data frame with results

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    !
                    
                      
  results_df <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    !
                    
                      
    comparison = comparisons,

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    !
                    
                      
    estimate = dunnett_summary$test$coefficients,

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    !
                    
                      
    std.error = dunnett_summary$test$sigma,

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    !
                    
                      
    statistic = dunnett_summary$test$tstat,

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    !
                    
                      
    p.value = p_values,

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    !
                    
                      
    conf.low = dunnett_confint$confint[, "lwr"],

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    !
                    
                      
    conf.high = dunnett_confint$confint[, "upr"],

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    !
                    
                      
    significant = p_values < alpha

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
  # Determine NOEC (No Observed Effect Concentration)

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
  # Extract dose levels from comparison strings and convert to numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    !
                    
                      
  dose_levels <- sapply(strsplit(comparisons, " - "), function(x) x[1])

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
  # Convert to numeric if possible

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    !
                    
                      
  numeric_doses <- suppressWarnings(as.numeric(dose_levels))

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    !
                    
                      
  if (all(!is.na(numeric_doses))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    !
                    
                      
    dose_levels <- numeric_doses

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
  # Find the highest dose with non-significant effect

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    !
                    
                      
  significant_effects <- p_values < alpha

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    !
                    
                      
  if (all(significant_effects)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    !
                    
                      
    noec <- min(dose_levels) # All doses show effects, NOEC is below lowest dose

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    !
                    
                      
    noec_message <- "All tested doses show significant effects. NOEC is below the lowest tested dose."

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    !
                    
                      
  } else if (!any(significant_effects)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    !
                    
                      
    noec <- max(dose_levels) # No doses show effects, NOEC is at or above highest dose

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    !
                    
                      
    noec_message <- "No significant effects detected at any dose. NOEC is at or above the highest tested dose."

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
    # Find the highest non-significant dose

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    !
                    
                      
    non_sig_doses <- dose_levels[!significant_effects]

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    !
                    
                      
    sig_doses <- dose_levels[significant_effects]

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    
                    
                      
    # Ensure we're working with proper numeric values for comparison

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    !
                    
                      
    if (is.numeric(non_sig_doses) && is.numeric(sig_doses)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    !
                    
                      
      noec <- max(non_sig_doses[non_sig_doses < max(sig_doses)])

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    
                    
                      
      # If doses aren't numeric, just return the highest non-significant level

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    !
                    
                      
      noec <- non_sig_doses[length(non_sig_doses)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    !
                    
                      
    noec_message <- paste("NOEC determined as", noec)

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    
                    
                      
  # Prepare return object

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    !
                    
                      
  result <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    !
                    
                      
    dunnett_test = dunnett_summary,

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    !
                    
                      
    results_table = results_df,

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    !
                    
                      
    noec = noec,

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    !
                    
                      
    noec_message = noec_message,

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    !
                    
                      
    model_type = paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    !
                    
                      
      ifelse(include_random_effect, "Mixed", "Fixed"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    !
                    
                      
      " model with ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    !
                    
                      
      variance_structure,

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    !
                    
                      
      " errors"

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    !
                    
                      
    control_level = control_level,

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    !
                    
                      
    alpha = alpha

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    !
                    
                      
  if (return_model) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    !
                    
                      
    result$model <- model

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    !
                    
                      
  class(result) <- "dunnett_test_result"

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    !
                    
                      
  return(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    
                    
                      
#' Print method for dunnett_test_result objects

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x A dunnett_test_result object

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... Additional arguments passed to print methods

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    
                    
                      
#' @concept NOEC

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    
                    
                      
print.dunnett_test_result <- function(x, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    !
                    
                      
  cat("Dunnett Test Results\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    !
                    
                      
  cat("-------------------\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    !
                    
                      
  cat("Model type:", x$model_type, "\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    !
                    
                      
  cat("Control level:", x$control_level, "\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    !
                    
                      
  cat("Alpha level:", x$alpha, "\n\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    !
                    
                      
  cat("Results Table:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    !
                    
                      
  print(x$results_table, row.names = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    !
                    
                      
  cat("\nNOEC Determination:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    !
                    
                      
  cat(x$noec_message, "\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot method for dunnett_test_result objects

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x A dunnett_test_result object

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... Additional arguments passed to plot methods

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom ggplot2 ggplot aes geom_point geom_errorbar theme_minimal labs geom_hline

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    
                    
                      
#' @concept NOEC

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    
                    
                      
plot.dunnett_test_result <- function(x, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    
                    
                      
  # Extract data for plotting

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    !
                    
                      
  plot_data <- x$results_table

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    !
                    
                      
  plot_data$comparison <- factor(plot_data$comparison,levels=plot_data$comparison)

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    
                    
                      
  # Create the plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    !
                    
                      
  p <- ggplot2::ggplot(plot_data, ggplot2::aes(x = comparison, y = estimate, color = significant)) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    !
                    
                      
    ggplot2::geom_point(size = 3) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    !
                    
                      
    ggplot2::geom_errorbar(ggplot2::aes(ymin = conf.low, ymax = conf.high), width = 0.2) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    !
                    
                      
    ggplot2::geom_hline(yintercept = 0, linetype = "dashed") +

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    !
                    
                      
    ggplot2::theme_minimal() +

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    !
                    
                      
    ggplot2::labs(

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    !
                    
                      
      title = paste("Dunnett Test Results:", x$model_type),

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    !
                    
                      
      subtitle = paste("NOEC =", x$noec),

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    !
                    
                      
      x = "Comparison",

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    !
                    
                      
      y = "Difference from Control",

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    !
                    
                      
      color = "Significant"

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    
                    
                      
    ) +

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    !
                    
                      
    ggplot2::theme(axis.text.x = ggplot2::element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    !
                    
                      
  return(p)

                    		
                  

                  

                    305
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' adding ECx estimation and interval to the model output plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @param p model plot as ggplot2 output

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object fitted drc object

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param EDres EDresults corresponding to respLev

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param trend "Decrease" or "Increase"

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param endpoint ErC or EbC or EyC or EC or LD

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param respLev reponse levels

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param textAjust.x  where to label ECx

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param textAjust.y where to label ECx

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param useObsCtr whether to use observed control mean

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param d0 to be used control mean.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param textsize label text size

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param lineheight errorbar height

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @param xmin when confidence intervals very wide including even negative values.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... additional inputs passed into ED functions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @return ggplot object with added ECx CIs.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' data("dat_medium")

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' dat_medium <- dat_medium %>% mutate(Treatment=factor(Dose,levels=unique(Dose)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' dat_medium$Response[dat_medium$Response < 0] <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' mod <- drm(Response~Dose,data=dat_medium,fct=LN.4())

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' p1 <- plot.modList(list(mod))

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' addECxCI(p1,object=mod,EDres=NULL,trend="Decrease",endpoint="EC", respLev=c(10,20,50),

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' textAjust.x=0.01,textAjust.y=0.3,useObsCtr=FALSE,d0=NULL,textsize = 4,lineheight = 0.5,xmin=0.012)+

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' ylab("Response Variable [unit]") + xlab("Concentration [µg a.s./L]")

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
addECxCI <- function(p = NULL, object, EDres = NULL, trend = "Decrease", endpoint = "ErC", respLev = c(10, 20, 50),

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
                     textAjust.x = 0.1, textAjust.y = 0.05, useObsCtr = FALSE, d0 = NULL, textsize = 2, lineheight = 1, xmin = 0.05, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    !
                    
                      
  if (respLev[1] < 1) respLev <- respLev * 100

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    !
                    
                      
  if (!inherits(object, "try-error")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    !
                    
                      
    type <- object$type

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    !
                    
                      
    coefs <- coef(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    !
                    
                      
    num <- length(coefs)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    !
                    
                      
    if ("c:(Intercept)" %in% names(coefs)) cVal <- coefs["c:(Intercept)"] else cVal <- 0 ## switch(response,Increase=0,Decrease=1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    !
                    
                      
    if ("d:(Intercept)" %in% names(coefs)) d <- coefs["d:(Intercept)"] else d <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
    # For 3 parameter models, if setting the 4th parameter being 0, then there is no need to change ECx estimation unless the observed control average should be used instead of the estimated control mean.

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
    ## As shown in the equation below, c=0 as assumed, d is the estimated control mean.

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
    ## EC_true x=EC_software {((d-(1-x)· mean(y_0 ))⁄((d-c)})

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    !
                    
                      
    if (d < cVal) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    !
                    
                      
      d1 <- d

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    !
                    
                      
      d <- cVal

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    !
                    
                      
      cVal <- d1

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    !
                    
                      
    if (type == "continuous" || type == "Poisson") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    !
                    
                      
      if (trend == "Increase") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
        ## for example, mortality can increase, however,

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
        ## the x% effect should be compared to the maximal survival probabilities.

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
        ## which means, (1-cVal)=max survival probability.

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
        ## There should be only reduction or inhibition.

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    !
                    
                      
        x.relative <- (respLev - cVal * 100) / (d - cVal)

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
        ### need to think about it!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
        warning("If not inhibition or reduction, be careful! ")

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    !
                    
                      
        if (!useObsCtr) d0 <- d

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    !
                    
                      
        x.relative <- d0 * respLev / (d - cVal)

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    !
                    
                      
      if (type == "binomial") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    !
                    
                      
        if (num > 2) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    !
                    
                      
          warning("need more study")

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    !
                    
                      
          x.relative <- respLev

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
        } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    !
                    
                      
          x.relative <- respLev

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("No need to plot as error occured in the model fitting already ")

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
  if (is.null(EDres)) EDres <- ED.plus(object, trend = trend, respLev = respLev, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
  ## browser()

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    !
                    
                      
  if (is.null(p)) p <- plot.modList(object, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    !
                    
                      
  if (trend == "Decrease") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
    Effect <- ((1 - respLev / 100) * d)

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    !
                    
                      
    warning("If not inhibition or reduction, be careful! ")

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    !
                    
                      
    Effect <- cVal + respLev / 100 * d ## note, for survival, d=1, for continuous, it is a different topic!!!!

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
  EDdat <- data.frame(EDres,

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    !
                    
                      
                      Effect = Effect,

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
                      text = paste0(endpoint, respLev)

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    !
                    
                      
  EDdat$Lower <- ifelse(EDdat$Lower > xmin, EDdat$Lower, xmin)

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
  p <- p + geom_point(data = EDdat, aes(x = .data$Estimate, y = .data$Effect), size = 3, col = "red") +

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    !
                    
                      
    geom_text(data = EDdat, aes(x = .data$Estimate + textAjust.x, y = .data$Effect + textAjust.y, label = text), size = textsize, col = "darkgreen") +

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
    geom_errorbarh(data = EDdat, aes(x = .data$Estimate, y = .data$Effect,

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    !
                    
                      
                                     xmin = .data$Lower, xmax = .data$Upper, height = lineheight), lty = 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    !
                    
                      
  return(p)

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#' Calculating ED following the regulatory ED definition.

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object fitted model using drc::drm

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#' @param respLev response level, the x of ECx.

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#' @param maxEff Not used for now. maximum effect.

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#' @param trend Increase of Decrease, whether the dose response is decreasing or increasing compared control.

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#' @param range using Percentage, not used for now.

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#' @param CI methods to calculate the confidence intervals, either "inv", "bmd-inv",(bmd) or "delta" or "fls".

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... other parameters for ED function

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Back calculated regulatory ECx

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#' @export ED.plus

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname ED.plus

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#' data("dat_medium")

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#' dat_medium <- dat_medium %>% mutate(Treatment=factor(Dose,levels=unique(Dose)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#' dat_medium$Response[dat_medium$Response < 0] <- 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#' mod <- drm(Response~Dose,data=dat_medium,fct=LL.3())

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#' fctList <- list(LN.4(),LL.4(),W1.3(),LL2.2())

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#' res <- mselect.plus(mod,fctList = fctList )

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#' modList <- res$modList

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' mod <-modList[[1]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#' edres <- ED.plus(mod,c(10,50),trend="Decrease")

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
ED.plus <- function(object, respLev, maxEff = TRUE, trend = "Increase", range = "Percentage", CI = c("delta", "inv", "bmd-inv"), ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
  ## Note that this might not be suitable for models with fixed c or d parameters, where

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    13x
                    
                      
  CI <- match.arg(CI)

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    13x
                    
                      
  if (!inherits(object, "try-error")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    13x
                    
                      
    if (CI == "delta") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    8x
                    
                      
      type <- object$type

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    8x
                    
                      
      coefs <- coef(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    8x
                    
                      
      num <- length(coefs)

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    8x
                    
                      
      if (grepl("log(ED50) as parameter", object$fct$text, fixed = TRUE)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    2x
                    
                      
        if (CI == "delta") interval <- "fls"

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    !
                    
                      
        if (CI == "inv") interval <- "bmd-inv"

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
        ## browser()

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    6x
                    
                      
        interval <- CI

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
      } ## could be "delta" or "inv"

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    2x
                    
                      
      if ("c:(Intercept)" %in% names(coefs)) cVal <- coefs["c:(Intercept)"] else cVal <- 0 ## switch(response,Increase=0,Decrease=1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    2x
                    
                      
      if ("d:(Intercept)" %in% names(coefs)) d <- coefs["d:(Intercept)"] else d <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
      # For 3 parameter models, if setting the 4th parameter being 0, then there is no need to change ECx estimation unless the observed control average should be used instead of the estimated control mean. As shown in the equation below, c=0 as assumed, d is the estimated control mean. EC_true x=EC_software {((d-(1-x)· mean(y_0 ))⁄((d-c)})

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    8x
                    
                      
      if (d < cVal) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    !
                    
                      
        print("check this case: using decay model to fit growth or vice versa.") ## using decay model to fit growth or vice versa.

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    !
                    
                      
        d1 <- d

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    !
                    
                      
        d <- cVal

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    !
                    
                      
        cVal <- d1

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
        # browser()

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    8x
                    
                      
      if (type == "continuous" || type == "Poisson") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    8x
                    
                      
        if (trend == "Increase") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    !
                    
                      
          x.relative <- (respLev - cVal * 100) / (d - cVal)

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
        } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
          ## x.relative <- d-(1-respLev/100)*y0/(d-c)

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    8x
                    
                      
          x.relative <- d * respLev / (d - cVal)

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    !
                    
                      
        if (type == "binomial") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    !
                    
                      
          if (num > 2) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    !
                    
                      
            warning("need more tests!!!, survival as response should be fine, but not mortality as response")

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    !
                    
                      
            x.relative <- respLev

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
          } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    !
                    
                      
            x.relative <- respLev

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
          }

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
      ## Add a step to check if x.relative is out of range!

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    8x
                    
                      
      id <- (x.relative > 100)

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    8x
                    
                      
      if (all(id)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    !
                    
                      
        res <- matrix(NA, length(respLev), 4) #

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    !
                    
                      
        colnames(res) <- c("Estimate", "Std. Error", "Lower", "Upper")

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    8x
                    
                      
        res <- drc::ED(object, respLev = x.relative[!id], display = FALSE, interval = interval, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    8x
                    
                      
        if (sum(id) > 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    !
                    
                      
          tmp <- matrix(NA, (sum(id)), ncol(res))

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
          ## browser()

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    !
                    
                      
          res <- rbind(res, tmp)

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    5x
                    
                      
      requireNamespace("bmd", quietly = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
      # tmp <- lapply(cross2(respLev,modList),function(l){

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
      #   x <- l[[1]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
      #   y <- l[[2]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
      #   res <- try(bmd(y,x/100,backgType="modelBased",def="relative",interval="inv",display=F))

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
      #   if(!inherits(res,"try-error")){

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
      #     return(c(res$Results[1],res$SE,res$interval))

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
      #   }else{

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
      #     return(rep(NA,4))

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
      #     }

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
      #

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
      # })

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    5x
                    
                      
      tmp <- lapply(respLev, function(l) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    15x
                    
                      
        x <- l[[1]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    15x
                    
                      
        y <- object

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    15x
                    
                      
        if (object$type == "binomial") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
          ## browser()

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    !
                    
                      
          res <- try(bmd(y, x / 100, backgType = "modelBased", def = "excess", interval = "delta", display = F),silent = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
        } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    15x
                    
                      
          res <- try(bmd(y, x / 100, backgType = "modelBased", def = "relative", interval = "inv", display = F),silent = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    15x
                    
                      
        if (!inherits(res, "try-error")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    14x
                    
                      
          return(c(res$Results[1], res$SE, res$interval))

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    
                    
                      
        } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    1x
                    
                      
          return(rep(NA, 4))

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
      })

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    5x
                    
                      
      res <- plyr::ldply(tmp)

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    5x
                    
                      
      colnames(res) <- c("Estimate", "Std. Error", "Lower", "Upper")

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    !
                    
                      
    res <- matrix(NA, length(respLev), 4) #

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    !
                    
                      
    colnames(res) <- c("Estimate", "Std. Error", "Lower", "Upper")

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    13x
                    
                      
  rownames(res) <- paste("EC", respLev)

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
