                    94
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x A formula object specifying the response variable and the factor for which the test is to be performed,

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#'          or an object of class 'aov' or 'lm'.

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#' @param method Character string specifying which implementation of Dunnett test to use:

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#'        "Dunnett_multcomp" (default) for multcomp implementation,

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#'        "Dunnett_DescTools" for DescTools implementation, or

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#'        "Dunnett_PMCMRplus" for PMCMRplus implementation.

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... Additional arguments passed to the underlying test functions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A data frame with standardized test results containing:

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#'   \item{comparison}{The comparison being made}

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#'   \item{estimate}{The estimated difference between groups}

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#'   \item{p.value}{The p-value for the test}

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#'   \item{conf.low}{Lower bound of the confidence interval}

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#'   \item{conf.high}{Upper bound of the confidence interval}

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#'   \item{method}{The method used for the test}

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom dplyr mutate select filter arrange %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom tibble tibble

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom multcomp glht mcp

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats aov confint

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom PMCMRplus dunnettTest

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom DescTools DunnettTest

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
broom_dunnett <- function(x, method = c("Dunnett_multcomp", "Dunnett_DescTools", "Dunnett_PMCMRplus"), ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    !
                    
                      
  method <- match.arg(method)

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    !
                    
                      
  if (method == "Dunnett_PMCMRplus") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    !
                    
                      
    result <- try({

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    !
                    
                      
      dt <- PMCMRplus::dunnettTest(x, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
      # Extract summary information

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    !
                    
                      
      dt_summary <- summary(dt)

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    !
                    
                      
      comparisons <- names(dt_summary$p.value)

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
      # Create standardized output

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    !
                    
                      
      tibble::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    !
                    
                      
        comparison = comparisons,

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    !
                    
                      
        estimate = dt_summary$estimate,

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    !
                    
                      
        p.value = dt_summary$p.value,

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    !
                    
                      
        conf.low = dt_summary$confint[, 1],

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    !
                    
                      
        conf.high = dt_summary$confint[, 2],

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    !
                    
                      
        method = "Dunnett_PMCMRplus"

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    !
                    
                      
    }, silent = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    !
                    
                      
  } else if (method == "Dunnett_DescTools") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    !
                    
                      
    result <- try({

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    !
                    
                      
      dt <- DescTools::DunnettTest(x, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
      # Extract the first element if it's a list (DescTools returns a list for multiple controls)

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    !
                    
                      
      if (is.list(dt) && !is.data.frame(dt)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    !
                    
                      
        dt <- dt[[1]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
      # Convert to tibble with standardized column names

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    !
                    
                      
      tibble::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    !
                    
                      
        comparison = rownames(dt),

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    !
                    
                      
        estimate = dt[, "diff"],

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    !
                    
                      
        p.value = dt[, "pval"],

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    !
                    
                      
        conf.low = dt[, "lwr"],

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    !
                    
                      
        conf.high = dt[, "upr"],

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    !
                    
                      
        method = "Dunnett_DescTools"

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    !
                    
                      
    }, silent = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    !
                    
                      
  } else if (method == "Dunnett_multcomp") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    !
                    
                      
    result <- try({

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
      # For multcomp, we need to create an aov model first

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    !
                    
                      
      if (inherits(x, "formula")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    !
                    
                      
        model_data <- list(...)$data

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    !
                    
                      
        if (is.null(model_data)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    !
                    
                      
          model_data <- environment(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    !
                    
                      
        aov_model <- aov(x, data = model_data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    !
                    
                      
      } else if (inherits(x, c("aov", "lm"))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    !
                    
                      
        aov_model <- x

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    !
                    
                      
        stop("x must be a formula, aov, or lm object for Dunnett_multcomp method")

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
      # Extract the factor name from the formula

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    !
                    
                      
      if (inherits(x, "formula")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    !
                    
                      
        terms <- terms(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    !
                    
                      
        factor_name <- attr(terms, "term.labels")[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
      } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    !
                    
                      
        factor_name <- names(aov_model$xlevels)[1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
      # Get control level

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    !
                    
                      
      control <- list(...)$control

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    !
                    
                      
      if (is.null(control)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    !
                    
                      
        control <- 1  # Default to first level

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
      # Create contrast matrix for Dunnett

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    !
                    
                      
      contrasts_call <- call("mcp")

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    !
                    
                      
      contrasts_call[[2]] <- as.name(factor_name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    !
                    
                      
      contrasts_call[[3]] <- "Dunnett"

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    !
                    
                      
      names(contrasts_call)[3] <- factor_name

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    !
                    
                      
      contrasts_call$base <- control

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    !
                    
                      
      dunnett_contrasts <- eval(contrasts_call)

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
      # Run the test

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    !
                    
                      
      glht_result <- multcomp::glht(aov_model, linfct = dunnett_contrasts)

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    !
                    
                      
      summary_result <- summary(glht_result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    !
                    
                      
      conf_int <- confint(glht_result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
      # Create standardized output

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    !
                    
                      
      tibble::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    !
                    
                      
        comparison = names(summary_result$test$pvalues),

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    !
                    
                      
        estimate = summary_result$test$coefficients,

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    !
                    
                      
        p.value = summary_result$test$pvalues,

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    !
                    
                      
        conf.low = conf_int$confint[, "lwr"],

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    !
                    
                      
        conf.high = conf_int$confint[, "upr"],

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    !
                    
                      
        method = "Dunnett_multcomp"

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    !
                    
                      
    }, silent = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    !
                    
                      
  if (inherits(result, "try-error")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    !
                    
                      
    warning("Dunnett test failed. Error: ", attr(result, "condition")$message)

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    !
                    
                      
    return(tibble::tibble(

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    !
                    
                      
      comparison = character(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    !
                    
                      
      estimate = numeric(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    !
                    
                      
      p.value = numeric(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    !
                    
                      
      conf.low = numeric(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    !
                    
                      
      conf.high = numeric(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    !
                    
                      
      method = character()

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    
                    
                      
    ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    !
                    
                      
  return(result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
## # FILE: tests/testthat/test_data_Helper.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Resolve the excel datasheet number issues

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' The `simplifyTreatment` function is designed to handle and simplify

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' a treatment vector, which can be either a factor or a character vector.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' The primary goal of this function is to resolve issues with numeric

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'  precision that often arise in Excel datasheets, such as numbers

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' being represented with excessive decimal places, like 12.300000000000001

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' or 8.3579999999999.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @param trt a treatment vector, either factor or character

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a simplified vector, either a factor or a character vector,

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' depending on x

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' x <- structure(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'   1L, 1L, 1L, 1L, 1L, 1L, 2L, 2L, 2L, 2L, 3L, 3L, 3L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   3L, 4L, 4L, 4L, 4L, 5L, 5L, 5L, 5L, 6L, 6L, 6L, 6L, 1L, 1L, 1L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   1L, 1L, 1L, 2L, 2L, 2L, 2L, 3L, 3L, 3L, 3L, 4L, 4L, 4L, 4L, 5L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   5L, 5L, 5L, 6L, 6L, 6L, 6L, 1L, 1L, 1L, 1L, 1L, 1L, 2L, 2L, 2L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   2L, 3L, 3L, 3L, 3L, 4L, 4L, 4L, 4L, 5L, 5L, 5L, 5L, 6L, 6L, 6L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   6L

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' ), levels = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   "Control", "1", "3.51", "12.300000000000001",

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'   "42.9", "150"

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' ), class = "factor")

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' simplifyTreatment(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
simplifyTreatment <- function(trt) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    5x
                    
                      
  if (is.factor(trt)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    2x
                    
                      
    leltrt <- levels(trt)

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    3x
                    
                      
    if (is.character(trt)) leltrt <- unique(trt)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    5x
                    
                      
  leltrtn <- suppressWarnings(as.numeric(leltrt))

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    5x
                    
                      
  leltrtc <- ifelse(is.na(leltrtn), leltrt, leltrtn)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    5x
                    
                      
  trt <- plyr::mapvalues(trt, from = leltrt, to = leltrtc)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    5x
                    
                      
  return(trt)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' Change from an expected wide format to long format

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @param widedat data in wide format

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @param cnames logical,1 or 0, whether to use the 1st row as the column names,

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' 1 means 1st row need to be converted to headers

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' @param repnames whether the 1st column is the Replicates column

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' @return a dataframe in long format

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' @keywords internal

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' # Create a sample wide dataset

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' widedat <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'   Replicates = c("Rep1", "Rep2", "Rep3"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'   Treatment1 = c(1.1, 2.2, 3.3),

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'   Treatment2 = c(4.4, 5.5, 6.6)

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#' drcHelper:::wide2long(widedat, cnames = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
wide2long <- function(widedat, cnames = 1, repnames = 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    4x
                    
                      
  if (cnames == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    2x
                    
                      
    widedat1 <- widedat[-1, ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    2x
                    
                      
    colnames(widedat1) <- widedat[1, ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    2x
                    
                      
    widedat1 <- widedat

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    4x
                    
                      
  if (repnames == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    3x
                    
                      
    longdat <- widedat1 |>

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    3x
                    
                      
      tidyr::pivot_longer(cols = seq_len(ncol(widedat))[-1])

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    3x
                    
                      
    names(longdat) <- c("Replicates", "Treatment", "Response")

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    1x
                    
                      
    longdat <- widedat1 |> tidyr::pivot_longer(cols = seq_len(ncol(widedat)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    1x
                    
                      
    names(longdat) <- c("Treatment", "Response")

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    4x
                    
                      
  longdat$Response <- as.numeric(longdat$Response)

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    4x
                    
                      
  longdat <- longdat |> dplyr::filter(!is.na(.data$Response))

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    4x
                    
                      
  return(longdat)

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
## Internal helper functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'@export

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
getComparison <- function(object,test=c("trend","many-to-one")){

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    !
                    
                      
  cnam <- colnames(object$p.value)

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    !
                    
                      
  rnam <- rownames(object$p.value)

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    !
                    
                      
  grp2 <- as.numeric(c(row(object$p.value)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    !
                    
                      
  test <- match.arg(test)

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    !
                    
                      
  if(test=="trend"){

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    !
                    
                      
    if (object$alternative == "less") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    !
                    
                      
      H0 <- sapply(grp2, function(i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    !
                    
                      
        if (i == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    !
                    
                      
          paste0(rnam[i], " >= ", cnam[1])

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    !
                    
                      
        else if (i == 2) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    !
                    
                      
          paste0(rnam[i], " >= ", rnam[i - 1], " >= ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    !
                    
                      
                 cnam[1])

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
        else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    !
                    
                      
          paste0(rnam[i], " >= ", rnam[i - 1], " >= ... >= ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    !
                    
                      
                 cnam[1])

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
      })

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    !
                    
                      
    else if (object$alternative == "greater") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    !
                    
                      
      H0 <- sapply(grp2, function(i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    !
                    
                      
        if (i == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    !
                    
                      
          paste0(rnam[i], " <= ", cnam[1])

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    !
                    
                      
        else if (i == 2) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    !
                    
                      
          paste0(rnam[i], " <= ", rnam[i - 1], " <= ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    !
                    
                      
                 cnam[1])

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
        else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    !
                    
                      
          paste0(rnam[i], " <= ", rnam[i - 1], " <= ... <= ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    !
                    
                      
                 cnam[1])

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
      })

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
    else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    !
                    
                      
      H0 <- sapply(grp2, function(i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    !
                    
                      
        if (i == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    !
                    
                      
          paste0(rnam[i], " == ", cnam[1])

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    !
                    
                      
        else if (i == 2) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    !
                    
                      
          paste0(rnam[i], " == ", rnam[i - 1], " == ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    !
                    
                      
                 cnam[1])

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
        else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    !
                    
                      
          paste0(rnam[i], " == ", rnam[i - 1], " == ... == ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    !
                    
                      
                 cnam[1])

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
      })

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
  }else{

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    !
                    
                      
    grp1 <- as.numeric(c(col(object$p.value)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    !
                    
                      
    if (!is.null(object$alternative)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    !
                    
                      
      if (object$alternative == "less") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
        H0 <- paste(rnam[grp2], "-", cnam[grp1], ">=", "0")

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
        ## PVAL <- paste("Pr(<", STAT, ")", sep = "")

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    !
                    
                      
      else if (object$alternative == "greater") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    !
                    
                      
        H0 <- paste(rnam[grp2], "-", cnam[grp1], "<=", "0")

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
        ## PVAL <- paste("Pr(>", STAT, ")", sep = "")

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
      else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    !
                    
                      
        H0 <- paste(rnam[grp2], "-", cnam[grp1], "==", "0")

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
        ## PVAL <- paste("Pr(>|", STAT, "|)", sep = "")

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
    else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    !
                    
                      
      H0 <- paste(rnam[grp2], "-", cnam[grp1], "==", "0")

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
      ## PVAL <- paste("Pr(>|", STAT, "|)", sep = "")

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    !
                    
                      
  return(H0)

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
## unit testing in test_helper_functions.R ###

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' Change Treatment groups to numerical dose

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x treatment groups with numbers and "Control"

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @return numeric vector of dose

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples treatment2dose(c("Control","0.1","1","10"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
treatment2dose <- function(x){

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    5x
                    
                      
  dose <- suppressWarnings(as.numeric(as.character(x)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    5x
                    
                      
  dose[is.na(dose)]<-0

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    5x
                    
                      
  dose

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' Reshape the wide data to long data

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @param dat data table with Replicate columns and dose groups

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @param replicate_col name of the replicate column or columns need to be retained as identifier columns.

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @return long format of the dat

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples  reshape_drcData(collembola_juveniles) ## note collembola_juveniles is fake data.

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
reshape_drcData <- function(dat, replicate_col = "Replicates") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    2x
                    
                      
  dat <- dat %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    2x
                    
                      
    tidyr::pivot_longer(cols = -all_of(replicate_col),

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    2x
                    
                      
                 names_to = "Treatment",

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    2x
                    
                      
                 values_to = "Response") %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    2x
                    
                      
    mutate(Dose = treatment2dose(.data$Treatment)) %>%

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    2x
                    
                      
    filter(!is.na(.data$Response))

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    2x
                    
                      
  return(dat)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
## YEAR: 2021

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
## COPYRIGHT HOLDER: ClinStats authors

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
## MIT licence

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#------------------------------------------------------------------------------#

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
## Unit Testing in # FILE: tests/testthat/test_quantal_categorical.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' Tarones test for Stratified OR (integrated from

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' https://github.com/the8thday/ClinStats/blob/master/R/Tarones.R). The original

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' MIT license is included in the source code. The function

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' is included for validation purpose. Please use the most updated function in

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' ClinStats package for related calculation in a non-GLP environment.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' \code{calcTaronesTest} is used to test whether the OR in different strata are different

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @param mylist A list of matrix Stratified by a Variable

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @param referencerow Unexposed row

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @return string with a list of p-values

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @details modified the output to return p-values, need metafor package to run

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom metafor rma.mh

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @aliases Tarones

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' mymatrix1 <- matrix(c(4,5,5,103),nrow=2,byrow=TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' colnames(mymatrix1) <- c("Disease","Control")

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' rownames(mymatrix1) <- c("Exposure","Unexposed")

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' mymatrix2 <- matrix(c(10,3,5,43),nrow=2,byrow=TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' colnames(mymatrix2) <- c("Disease","Control")

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' rownames(mymatrix2) <- c("Exposure","Unexposed")

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' mylist <- list(mymatrix1,mymatrix2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' calcTaronesTest(mylist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' calcTaronesTest(mymatrix1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
calcTaronesTest <- function(mylist, referencerow = 2) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
  # requireNamespace("metafor")

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    2x
                    
                      
  numstrata <- length(mylist)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
  # make an array "ntrt" of the number of people in the exposed group, in each stratum

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
  # make an array "nctrl" of the number of people in the unexposed group, in each stratum

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
  # make an array "ptrt" of the number of people in the exposed group that have the disease,

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
  # in each stratum

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
  # make an array "pctrl" of the number of people in the unexposed group that have the disease,

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
  # in each stratum

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
  # make an array "htrt" of the number of people in the exposed group that don't have the

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
  # disease, in each stratum

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
  # make an array "hctrl" of the number of people in the unexposed group that don't have the

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
  # disease, in each stratum

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    1x
                    
                      
  ntrt <- vector()

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    1x
                    
                      
  nctrl <- vector()

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    1x
                    
                      
  ptrt <- vector()

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    1x
                    
                      
  pctrl <- vector()

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    1x
                    
                      
  htrt <- vector()

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    1x
                    
                      
  hctrl <- vector()

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (referencerow == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    !
                    
                      
    nonreferencerow <- 2

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    1x
                    
                      
    nonreferencerow <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    1x
                    
                      
  for (i in 1:numstrata)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
  {

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    2x
                    
                      
    mymatrix <- mylist[[i]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    2x
                    
                      
    DiseaseUnexposed <- mymatrix[referencerow, 1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    2x
                    
                      
    ControlUnexposed <- mymatrix[referencerow, 2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    2x
                    
                      
    totUnexposed <- DiseaseUnexposed + ControlUnexposed

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    2x
                    
                      
    nctrl[i] <- totUnexposed

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    2x
                    
                      
    pctrl[i] <- DiseaseUnexposed

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    2x
                    
                      
    hctrl[i] <- ControlUnexposed

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    2x
                    
                      
    DiseaseExposed <- mymatrix[nonreferencerow, 1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    2x
                    
                      
    ControlExposed <- mymatrix[nonreferencerow, 2]

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    2x
                    
                      
    totExposed <- DiseaseExposed + ControlExposed

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    2x
                    
                      
    ntrt[i] <- totExposed

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    2x
                    
                      
    ptrt[i] <- DiseaseExposed

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    2x
                    
                      
    htrt[i] <- ControlExposed

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  # calculate Tarone's test of homogeneity, using the rma.mh function from the

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
  # "metafor" package

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
  # Meta-Analysis via the Mantel-Haenszel Method

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    1x
                    
                      
  tarone <- metafor::rma.mh(ptrt, htrt, pctrl, hctrl, ntrt, nctrl)

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    1x
                    
                      
  pvalue <- tarone$TAp

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    1x
                    
                      
  print(paste("Pvalue for Tarone's test =", pvalue))

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    1x
                    
                      
  return(list(pval=pvalue,tarone=tarone))

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
}
